messages.message:
Hi Team,
Is there any way to allow a commercial customer to share the app outside their organization? This would be helpful for our internal troubleshooting and for customer to share the app externally with other companies, like their own customers, without requiring them to join the organization.
Not right now @Jet - the app can only be shared within their organization. You can submit a feature request and we can consider this for future quarters

@hannah I created the feature request. It'll be very helpful for our internal troubleshooting for the eng team also. customer can share the app, and we can try to reproduce the issue on our end without asking eng and the customer to join a call for live troubleshooting.
